meaningMnemonic: On the <kanji>soil</kanji> we put <kanji>sack</kanji>s in a circle to mark the <vocabulary>ring</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>arena</vocabulary> in sumo. Go look up some pictures of this word in Japanese and you'll see exactly what we mean. Better yet, go see some live sumo!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
